mapper.select: SELECT tui.uid, tui.invited_uid, tui.create_time, tu.phone, tu.commission, tu.img, CASE WHEN(tu.is_vip=0) THEN '普通会员' WHEN(tu.is_vip=1) THEN "VIP会员" END AS isVip FROM t_user_inviter tui, t_user tu WHERE tui.invited_uid = tu.uid AND tui.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY tui.create_time DESC
